data.name: Game of Thrones
data.overview: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

data.name: Breaking Bad
data.overview: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

data.name: The Walking Dead
data.overview: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

data.name: Friends
data.overview: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

data.name: Stranger Things
data.overview: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

data.name: Sherlock
data.overview: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

data.name: The Big Bang Theory
data.overview: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

data.name: Dexter
data.overview: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.

data.name: How I Met Your Mother
data.overview: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

data.name: True Detective
data.overview: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.
